org.glassfish.hk2.tests.locator.servicelocatorutilities

Class ServiceLocatorUtilitiesTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.hk2.tests.locator.servicelocatorutilities.ServiceLocatorUtilitiesTest

  • public class ServiceLocatorUtilitiesTest
extends Object
    This tests ServiceLocatorUtility methods that are not tested in other suites
    Author:
    jwells
